Description:
Family Living with Space & Style!
Located in "Beautiful Mt Aitkin" one of the most sought after pocket in Craigieburn and within proximity to all major amenities. This impressive family home offers space and style with its flowing floor plan with 2.7 high ceiling running throughout featuring modern open plan living including great size kitchen with stone bench tops & walk-in pantry overlooking a large family and meals area with an access to the outdoor entertainment area. 5 generous size bedrooms (2 masters with full ensuites and WIR and all with BIR's), separate study, central bathroom, 4th toilet, spacious laundry, double garage with remote and internal access.
Fixtures and fittings including: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, visual intercom, alarm system, dishwasher, double blinds, curtains, and much more.
Insights: 24 Banjolina Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Well-appointed kitchen with SS appliances, dishwasher, single remote control garage, alarm system, separate laundry, open plan meals & family area. The property is position at couple of hundred metres from Craigieburn Plaza and 5 min walk to the train station and much more
Inspect now before it's too late!

Description:
Quality From Start to Finish!
Perfectly positioned in the Aston Estate, this near new property is the ideal choice for a first home buyer or the budding investor. With everything from A-Z done for you, this is an opportunity you dont want to miss. This fantastic home showcases a master bedroom with built in robe and ensuite, two further bedrooms with built in robe serviced by a central bathroom, well equipped kitchen featuring stone benchtops and quality stainless steel appliances which overlooks the open light filled living and dining area. Complete with landscaped gardens, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, intercom and blinds. With a potential rental income of $1650 per calendar month investors dont look any further and with the First Home Buyers Grant available for first home buyers dont pass this up. Inspection is a must as this delightful property will impress you.

Description:
Comfort & Character in Perfect Location
This home is guaranteed to impress with its generous design, impeccable presentation & long list of added features. Its smartly configured floor plan is designed for easy living, as this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers & investors alike!
From its attractive facade this home comprises 3 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & ensuite), formal front lounge, gourmet kitchen with adjoining meals area & spacious family room. Step outside to a paved alfresco area with outdoor heater & fan, perfect for those that like to entertain!
Within minutes to a range of lifestyle attractions including Malcolm Creek trails, local shops, Mt Ridley College, Craigieburn Primary School, child care facilities, public transport, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre.
Further features include; high ceilings, heating, cooling, single car garage with drive-through access, water tank, north-facing backyard, landscaped gardens & so much more!
Insights: 30 Chelsworth Loop, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Fabulous Family Expanse with Perfect Parkland Views
On a large elevated allotment (approx 674sqm) overlooking Aitken Creek wetlands, this single- level sensation provides a family lifestyle of absolute quality, versatility & perfect privacy - all just moments from the lake in Highlands' most exclusive dress circle location.
Surrounded by lush gardens, this remarkable Porter Davis home showcases a large master
bedroom with impressive robes & double-vanity ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms & stylish
main bathroom. Its family credentials are further strengthened by a separate lounge/TV room & expansive open-plan living/dining area joined by a stone-bench kitchen with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, quality appliances & ample cupboard space. High ceilings add to the appeal along with zoned ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, additional wood heater (living area), alarm system & full-size laundry.
Step outside to discover a sensational backyard oasis with undercover entertaining deck,
expansive low-maintenance synthetic turf & the most impressive perimeter hedges in all of
Craigieburn for outstanding privacy, plus the added advantage of a sideway storage shed,
2100L watertank & remote-control double garage.
An aspirational family lifestyle opportunity, it's also close to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, popular schools & childcare facilities, endless walking/cycling trails as well as public transport & major arterials.
Insights: 21 Cascade Terrace, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Parkland Perfection
Situated directly adjacent beautiful Mt Ridley parkland, this town home is perfect for first home buyers, down-sizers & investors.
On offer is functional living for all with an open plan kitchen/meals/ living area, comprising of stainless steal appliances, stone benchtops, split system heating & cooling all flowing effortlessly onto a courtyard perfect for entertaining all year round. This home boasts two oversized bedrooms and central bathroom.
In a prime location close to all of Craigieburn's amenities, this property is surrounded by parks, within walking distance to Public Transport, Highlands-Stockland Shopping Centre, Mt Ridley College & Newbury Primary School. Be quick to inspect as this won't hang around for long.

Description:
Stunning Quality With Location To Match.
Immaculate in presentation, built with style, comfort and luxury in mind, this light filled stunning luxury residence is a vision of unwavering opulence. Greeted by a widened hallway, generous size formal lounge, high ceilings and an overall warmness you immediately know this will be something special. Comprising of a well-appointed designer kitchen with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher & perfectly designed adjacent to an oversized meals and family room leading out into a beautifully low maintenance outdoor area, not to mention a generous size master bedroom with luxurious ensuite, walk in robe and much more.
With quality inclusions and features consisting of ducted heating and refrigerated ducted cooling, upstairs rumpus room, 3 well-proportioned bedrooms with built in robes, main bathroom, formal lounge, double lock up garage with remote control access, downlights throughout, Holland blinds and the list truly goes on.
Set in one of Craigieburn's premium estates, amongst quality homes and parklands, this property needs to be inspected to be appreciated. Close by to schools, Craigieburn central, splash aquatic and leisure centre and public transport Call Now For An Inspection.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances dishwasher & walk in pantry, striking main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining oversized family room, formal lounge, study/home office, double tiled lock up garage with internal access, custom build storage shed and much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight, complete with under cover alfresco decked area & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating, reverse cycle heating & cooling, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including Craigieburn Central shopping centre, Stockland Shopping Centre, schools, local shops, public transport & childcare facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
Attractions In Every Direction..
The cul-de-sac setting of this inviting, impressive home is surrounded by several significant lifestyle assets including the bike paths and parkland that borders Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Our Ladys Catholic Primary School and the green expanses of Craigieburn Public Golf Course. Such an advantageous address enhances an ideal family design on some 690m2, featuring ample parking, a substantial carport and a huge secure garage with great storage and workshop space.
Gleaming polished floorboards and front garden aspects from a bay window complement a welcoming lounge that concludes with access to a fabulous covered pergola. Generous living/dining areas that open independently to the pergola include a kitchen zone where size, style, storage and stainless steel appliances form a combination that makes catering to a family easy. Three bedrooms, including a main bedroom with walk-in robes and ensuite, a spa bathroom and a separate laundry ensure exceptional comfort completes a home of outstanding evident quality.
Insights: 3 Chinnock Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Excellence with Indoor Style & Outdoor Space
In a family-focused neighbourhood within seconds to all amenities, this freestanding 3 bedroom Henley home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle of contemporary quality, floorplan flexibility & urban practicality.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & sparkling central bathroom. Dual living zones include a separate lounge & spacious open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete with walk-in pantry, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling & split-system air-conditioning, ceiling fans to all bedrooms, family-sized laundry, a huge enclosable outdoor pergola plus a surprisingly large backyard perfect for kids to play, internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled) & much much more!
Moments from both Thorngrove Reserve & Watermill Reserve, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools as well as a choice of shopping centres.
Insights: 328 Waterview Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
14 Millenium Road, Craigieburn - North Facing Brand New Home
(PLEASE USE WWW.WHEREIS.COM OR APPLE IPHONE MAPS TO FIND THE ADDRESS)
Ticks all the buyer's wish list
1. Land size - 350 sqm
2. 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & double garage
3. 900m walk to Aitken Creek Primary School & Hume Tennis and community centre
4. Approx 2.5 kms to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre
5. Approx 5 kms to Craigieburn Train Station
6. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at 900m walk
7. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 14 Millenium Road, Craigieburn (CURRENTLY UNDER CONSTRUCTION AND COMPLETION BY MARCH 2020) in the prestigious Highlands estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools. Photos are from previous similar property.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home.
14 Millenium Road Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provisions for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Photo ID must be presented upon all open & private inspections.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A FAMILY HAVEN ON 757M2 WITH GOLF COURSE VIEWS
Nestled in a private, tranquil and scenic position, this single level family home is sure to make a lasting impression.
An attractive façade, flowing floor plan, fabulous entertaining zones and impeccable surrounds illustrate the allure of this tastefully enhanced home delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with picture perfect views onto the famous greens of the Craigieburn golf course.
The heart of the home is the open plan kitchen, meals and family room that is awash with loads of natural light and overlooks the extensive decked alfresco entertaining area which seamlessly flows onto the large backyard and solar/gas heated swimming pool. Further complementing the homes functional design is the separate theatre room that is the ideal retreat for all your movie time events and the separate study that is the ideal place to complete after hours work commitments.
Sleeping quarters include three spacious robed bedrooms serviced by a main bathroom, a grand master suite complete with a large walk in robe and double vanity ensuite. To top it all off, this stunning residence also includes plantation shutters, 900mm kitchen appliances, stone benches, security cameras, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, alarm, water tank and x2 garden sheds.
Situated only minutes to all Craigieburns impressive list of amenities including Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre/Theatres, Craigieburn Junction, Hume Global Learning Centre/Library, Medical Centres, Craigieburn Golf Course and Splash Aquatic Park / Leisure Centre.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 5 Laguna Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME WITH ELITE ADDRESS
This beautifully presented home offers first-class features that highlight the allure of this sensational home providing absolute style in one of Craigieburn's most aspirational neighbourhoods
The home comprises of 4 large bedrooms, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, fully equipped kitchen with Cesar Stone benchtops, stainless steel cooking appliances, butlers pantry, dishwasher & undermount sink overlooking a spacious meals area & family room.
Outside, a fabulous enclosed alfresco entertaining area & wonderfully private backyard offering low-maintenance ease. Surrounded by other homes of quality & class, it also offers easy access to Craigieburn's best facilities including Craigieburn Central Shopping Precinct, Schools, Splash Aquatic Centre, Medical Services, parks & trails, public transport & so much more!
Expect all the modern features which include a double remote garage, floating timber flooring, ducted heating & split system cooling. Come inside and appreciate what this residence has to offer!

Description:
Family Flexibility in a Beautiful Quiet Location
A terrific opportunity to enjoy this phenomenal home that delivers an outstanding family lifestyle with its spacious design, quality features & versatile living spaces- all on a low maintenance block with wonderful landscaped gardens front & back.
The expansive interior comprises of 4 bedrooms (extra-large master) all with robes, stylish ensuite & walk-in robe to master, main family bathroom & a separate powder room downstairs. Multiple living zones include formal lounge, upstairs retreat & light-filled open living/dining area.
Add to this a stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances, walk-in pantry, ample cupboard & bench space, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, family-sized laundry, under-stair storeroom & double remote garage with internal entry, plus decked alfresco entertaining area & plenty of room for kids to play on synthetic grass.
All of this located In a popular Highlands neighbourhood within close proximity to walking trails, schools, shops & public transport.

Description:
Stylish young townhouse in the heart of Craigieburn!
This stylish young townhouse is the ideal place to live a care-free, low maintenance lifestyle - set among picturesque parklands, walking trails and adventure playgrounds at your doorstep.
Comprising of 3 very large bedrooms with great storage, main with full ensuite and WIR, sparkling central bathroom, fully equipped kitchen with quality s/s appliances (incl. dishwasher), meals area, and a spacious family room which flows through to an outdoor terrace perfect for BBQ's and entertaining all year round. All this complimented with blinds, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, private courtyard, remote controlled double garage and more! Conveniently located in heart of the ever popular Craigieburn with all major amenities at your fingertips.
Nearby schools include Aitken Creek Primary School, Oscar Romero Catholic School and Newbury Primary. Also walking distance to Hume Tennis & Community Centre, Watermill Reserve and Grand Blvd shops.

Description:
Spacious 4 Bedroom House on 400m2
Perfect for anyone looking for pristine minimal maintenance living, this beautiful home is ideal for first home buyers and investors alike. This is the home that should be on the top of your list.
Offering 4 good size bedrooms, master with WIR and enst and BIRs to remaining 2 bedrooms, formal lounge, generous size kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining large meals and family area that lead out to a beautifully landscaped yard.
Added features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, extra split system in living area and a double lock up garage with internal and external access .
Perfectly positioned home in the ever-popular Fairways Estate and only moments away from golf course, Kolby College, Craigieburn Central and much much more.
Dont miss out on this amazing opportunity!

Description:
Elegant Living Desirable Location
Finally, here's the home you've been waiting for... This beautiful grand family home built to the highest standards with no expense spared is sure to delight the fussiest of buyers.
From the moment you arrive at your dream destination, all the work has already been done. Boasting a flexible floor plan consisting of a wide entry, formal lounge, modern kitchen including stainless steel appliances, stone bench top with butlers pantry, family and meals area.
This stunning home also features a separate living / theatre room, bathroom and a guest bedroom or study which is ideal for the home office. Making your way upstairs you'll find a hotel style ensuite which features a double vanity, private balcony with breathtaking views, three more spacious bedrooms with BIR's, family retreat and a central bathroom. There is also a large alfresco/outdoor area with beautiful landscaped gardens.
Extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, alarm, dishwasher, remote garage, spacious laundry with ample storage, plantation shutters side access and garden shed. This home is truly one not to be missed, an inspection is essential to fully appreciate what is on offer!
If location matters, then this is your next home.
Insights: 21 Clopton Rise, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Proudly Presented With Location To Match...
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family Henley built home has to offer.
With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Just some of the comforts on hand include master bedroom with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals/family room equipped with timber plantation shutters, Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight surrounded by low maintenance gardens, a double garage with internal access, ducted heating makes this the complete package. Within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, and just a stone throw away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one won't last!
Insights: 45 Domain Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
